name: Project Platformer (Debonair Breakfast Bear)
description:
This a prototype of a platformer game I've been working on for most of 2020.

Download Now! Prototype Features
  • Platforming Adventure: Take on tricky jumps and challenging puzzles while collecting points to get to the end of the level alive!
  • Four Levels: Each with different challenges that will keep you guessing about what's around the corner!
  • Local Leaderboard: Keep track of your progress and how you're improving
  • Easy to understand controls: Move. Jump. Attack. That's it!

Project Prototype is a personal passion project to create a fun adventure platformer that provides a decent challenge and is full of new experiences and secrets to find.

Inspired by old school platforming games, Project Platformer hopes to bring the fun, challenge and adrenaline filled moments of classic platformers in to a more modern setting.
